title: 07/01/2021 - HOUR 2 - College athletes, Bucks, PGs
itunes:title: 07/01/2021 - HOUR 2 - College athletes, Bucks, PGs
description:
College athletes can now make money off their name, image, and likeness

The Bucks will have to win tonight without Giannis Antetokounmpo

The point guard is the quarterback of the NBA


Guest: Justin Turner
